tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE heart_rate_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  heart_rate INT
)

CREATE TABLE heart_rate_data (
    user_id INT,
    heart_rate FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE health_metrics (
    user_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    bmi FLOAT,
    heart_condition BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    age INTEGER,
    gender VARCHAR,
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthAssessment (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessment_result VARCHAR,
    recommendation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE user_accounts (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE
)

CREATE TABLE heart_rate_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  heart_rate INT,
  recorded_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE health_assessment (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  assessment_date DATE,
  heart_rate_variability DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE doctor_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HeartRateData (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   heart_rate INT
)

CREATE TABLE UserProfiles (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   first_name VARCHAR(50),
   last_name VARCHAR(50),
   age INT,
   gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceInfo (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   device_type VARCHAR(50),
   manufacturer VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthConditions (
   user_id INT,
   condition_name VARCHAR(50),
   diagnosed_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SleepData (
   user_id INT,
   date DATE,
   sleep_duration INT
)
